name: Crabman
description:
Crabmen are amphibious humanoids who live in coastal regions and avoid violence.

**Combat**: Claw attacks only when threatened.

**Habitat/Society**: Peaceful underwater settlements.

**Ecology**: Harvest sea plants and fish.

name: Dark Creeper
description:
Dark creepers are secretive beings cloaked in shadows, preferring theft and ambush to open battle.

**Combat**: Weapon attacks and darkness powers.

**Habitat/Society**: Hidden cities.

**Ecology**: Feed on stolen goods and fear.
